svg.text: Showroom Lab Creator Workflow
INPUTS: What the Skill Asks For
• New lab or continue existing? (determines if index/overview/details needed)
• Target directory (default: content/modules/ROOT/pages/)
• Lab story planning (name, goal, audience, company scenario, duration)
• Module details (file name, reference materials, learning objective, exercises)
PROCESS: What the Skill Does
1. Reads verification prompts to ensure quality standards
2. Analyzes reference materials (URLs, files, docs) for content
3. For NEW labs: Generates 4 files in order:
- index.adoc (learner landing page)
- 01-overview.adoc (business scenario, learning objectives)
- 02-details.adoc (technical requirements, timing)
- 03-module-01-*.adoc (first hands-on module)
4. For EXISTING labs: Generates next module (0X-module-YY-*.adoc)
5. Includes verification checkpoints, learning outcomes, troubleshooting
6. Uses proper AsciiDoc formatting with Red Hat style compliance
7. Updates site.yml and antora.yml (for new labs)
8. Updates nav.adoc with new module entries
9. Asks if last module → generates mandatory conclusion if yes
10. Manages token output (writes files, shows brief confirmations only)
OUTPUTS: What It Creates
For NEW labs:
✓ index.adoc - Learner landing page with prerequisites
✓ 01-overview.adoc - Business scenario and learning objectives
✓ 02-details.adoc - Technical requirements, module timing, authors
✓ 03-module-01-*.adoc - First hands-on module with exercises
For EXISTING labs:
✓ 0X-module-YY-*.adoc - Next sequential module
For LAST module:
✓ 0X-conclusion.adoc - Summary, next steps, consolidated references
All modules include verification checkpoints, learning outcomes, and Red Hat style compliance
